oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Data Network for better European Organic Market Information - D7.1 Recommendations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zanoli, Raffaele
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Surveys and statistics
Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this part of the work is to set out the detailed recommendations for significant improvements in the availability and quality of statistical information on the organic market. The recommendations are outlined in a short sentence followed by specific bullet points identifying areas of improvements. The recommendations are then described briefly in terms of background, objectives, and specific actions linked to the criteria and principles explained hereinafter.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Zanoli, Raffaele (2014) Data Network for better European Organic Market Information - D7.1 Recommendations. Universit√† Politecnica delle Marche, Ancona, Italy.
